significant # of historians, to make clear this is not a fringe view. The source says a "good number" of historians

does not need to be capitalized here
NPOV requires that all significant views be revealed. Numerous sources say Fascism is in the center, neither left nor right
Collectivism is not exclusively left wing. That source is describing a chart, not talking about commonly accepted definitions of left and right wing.
Since you bring up collectivism it has to be should be noted that collectivism is on the left ....I dont think any scholars consider it to be on the right.
Did not find Mussolini using "ideology" in regard to that.
Reword and create as new paragraph - reasons in talk
might as well use the full section from Mussolini since he makes the parallel claim about it being Collectivist

I swear, if someone removes this again. It says its far right at the top then it says fascism hates INDIVIDUALISM, if you hate that, you want COLLECTIVISM, which is far left!

/* Fascist as epithet */ This information is relevant - not all misapplications of the term are equal.
/* Fascist as epithet */ useless extra wordage - we might as well say "tall people and short people" - section name specifies "epithet"
/* Fascist as epithet */ Okay, but can I still trim it back a bit? Also, I don't think it is clear that the word "usually" here would be apt.
/* Historical causes of the rise of fascism */
It should be noted that not only left-wingers like to bandy around the term for their political opponents.
/* Foreign policy */ This quote doesn't seem to be directly about imperialisam or any philosophy in foreign policy
